Grand Magister Fairen:
First, meet* Messenger Naran Ashanuk* of the Varka Silenos tribe. They've been hiring mercenaries, and this is a great opportunity to gain their trust! Soul Guide Udan Mardui, the Chief Shaman of the Varka Silenos has a* Divine Stone of Wisdom* that we simply must have! If things don't go well with the Varkas, try the Ketra Orcs. They also have a stone.
